name: Dazzle Vegan Long-Wear Eyeshadow Stick
about: What it is:A vegan, long-wear eyeshadow stick loaded with brilliant flecks of multidimensional pearlescence to deliver prismatic color in a flash..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Featuring a 36 percent-water base that glides on with a refreshing feel, the formula dries down to a smooth and lustrous finish, locking prismatic pearl color onto lids. Don¬ët let the water fool you‚Äîthis pigment-packed eyeshadow delivers rich, opaque color for ultra-dazzling dimension.
ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Methylpropanediol, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Titanium/Titanium Dioxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Chloride, PEG-100 Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Tin Oxide, Ceteareth-20, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dimethicone, Steareth-100, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently swipe the shadow onto lids, using light pressure..-Blend out the edges with your fingers or your favorite cruelty-free eyeshadow brush. ..Beauty tip:.-Get creative and combine different shades together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the formula of this shadow, and the color and pigmentation are there for me, but I just can't get behind the packaging. An eyeshadow stick has to be easy to use on the eyes, and this is shaped like a straight up lipstick. I used to by just rubbing a brush or my finger directly on the product and then applying it to my face, but I feel like that defeats the purpose behind a product like this. It works better when applied with fingers, by the way. Other than the actual packaging and user experience' side of things, I think it's a good product. I used it as a glitzy highlight on my cheeks too and got lots of compliments.

reviews.review_text: This is a pretty shimmer cream eyeshadow! If you have oily eyelids, I would recommend prepping the eyelids first with a primer or concealer and then put this over top for longer wear. I have dry eyelids, so putting this directly on my lid worked well but the color did fade by the end of the night! I‚Äôm curious to try out more colors of this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try the KVD Dazzle Stick in Hail Surge, which I received complimentary in exchange for my honest review. Let me tell you, it has quickly become a staple in my beauty routine! Not only do I love using it as an eyeshadow, but I've also discovered that it mixes beautifully with sunscreen or moisturizer for an all-over shimmer that gives my skin an incredible glow. The highly pigmented shade is especially flattering for my fair skin, adding just the right amount of sparkle without overpowering.  The staying power of this product is truly impressive. It‚Äôs easy to blend and lasts throughout the day without fading or creasing, which is a major win for any makeup enthusiast. I'm thoroughly impressed by how versatile and effective the KVD Dazzle Stick is. Whether I'm aiming for a subtle shine or a bold eye look, this product delivers with flying colors. Highly recommend for anyone looking to add a touch of dazzle to their cosmetic collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin with fine lines and mild texture. I'm fair skin with neutral and cool undertone. I prefer color with a neutral undertone (on occasion with a cool undertone) in mid to deep shades. Eyeshadows in mid to deep blues, purples (not plum), greens, browns and greys. Lippies in brown with purple (not plum) undertone, vampy reds, muted purples and deep mauve and berries.  I was excited about this eyeshadow. I envisioned a beautiful metallic or foil. Instead I was met with intense glitter, not shimmer. I selected Flash Storm because it appeared neutral and cool in the swatches, but it shows up peachy/orange on my skin. Not a fan of the color or the glitter. I don't believe it will last all day with how easily I was able to smudge it after taking photos.  The rebrand is giving 80s goth vibes. Overall not a fan of this new KVD. I miss the OG. I'm sure the clean beauty crowd will love it, but that's not me.  Photo (left to right):  KVD Dazzle Stick in Flash Storm 30 KVD Tattoo Liner in Trooper Black 10 Sydney Grace Somber Huda Beauty Pretty Grunge in Haphazard

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stick eyeshadow features a finish that stands out due to its high concentration of glitter, which can feel heavy for some users, especially due to its overly light color base. Because of this, I prefer applying it as a topper to prevent the glitter from transferring onto the rest of the makeup and clothing throughout the day, even after using a fixative, or alternatively, I prefer a light layer that adds a subtle touch of shimmer without being too flashy. I'm not a fan of applying this type of particles near the eyes.  Regarding application, it's possible to layer the product without it becoming patchy, but since it consists mainly of glitter layers, I opt for a discreet application. I believe the composition could be improved by selecting more appealing glitters and adding a bit more color. Additionally, I think it would be beneficial to replace ingredients like Phenoxyethanol and PEG to prevent eye irritations, something I've experienced with this product.  I like the lipstick-style packaging presentation, although I find the product to be too soft and prone to deformation with use, which affects the application experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of this shadow stick is very soft, almost gel-like, so I have found that it takes a bit of care to apply. If you apply it directly from the shadow stick onto the eye, the color appears more pigmented, and it provides a metallic finish. I have found that this is not my favorite method because it can clump a little, and I prefer a glitter finish rather than a metallic one. I like to apply this product by tapping it onto my eyelids with my finger instead. This method makes it look more like an eyeshadow topper, and it provides a beautiful dusting of glitter. I have the color hail surge and by applying it this way, the base appears clear, and you are left with a beautiful multidimensional rose gold glitter. It is stunning when it hits the light. The first time I swatched it on my hand, I kept finding myself admiring it throughout the day every time the light hit it. I haven't had any issues with creasing, but again I am not applying it in a thick layer across my lid. I was a little disappointed with the component as it feels a bit light in the hand, but that is just my personal preference. Overall this product in the shade hail surge is stunning as an eyeshadow topper rather than a one and done shadow, and I would recommend it to those looking for a glitter topper that is easy to apply and wears nicely throughout the day.

reviews.review_text: Kat Von D's Dazzle Stick Eyeshadow in Hail Surge is a stunning, multidimensional shade that delivers intense pigmentation and long-lasting wear. The creamy, water-based formula glides effortlessly onto the lids, providing opaque color payoff with a smooth, sparkling finish.   Hail Surge is a beautiful icy hue packed with iridescent pearls that catch the light, creating a prismatic effect. The eyeshadow stick is incredibly easy to apply - simply swipe it directly onto the lids and blend out with a brush or fingertips for a seamless, blended look.  One of the standout features is its impressive longevity. Once set, the eyeshadow doesn't crease or fade, lasting all day without the need for a primer.As a vegan and cruelty-free product, Hail Surge aligns with Kat Von D's brand values, making it a guilt-free indulgence for conscious beauty enthusiasts.  Overall, the Dazzle Stick Eyeshadow in Hail Surge is a must-have for anyone seeking a high-impact, long-wearing eyeshadow with a unique, multidimensional finish.Its creamy texture, intense color payoff, and impressive staying power make it a versatile and reliable addition to any makeup collection.

reviews.review_text: I tried the KVD Beauty Dazzle Vegan Long-Wear Eyeshadow Stick in the shade Electro Bolt and I was completely impressed. The creamy formula glides on smoothly without any tugging, making it easy to achieve your precise look even when you're in a hurry. I like the way the product blends; you can easily diffuse it for a more subtle look or create a bold, vibrant effect. One of the standout features is the long-lasting formula. True to its claims, the eyeshadow lasted all day without creasing or fading, even on my oily eyelids. This makes it perfect for long days or nights out when I don't want to worry about touching up again. Another big plus is that it's vegan and cruelty-free, in line with KVD Beauty's commitment to ethical beauty. It's always rewarding to find high-performing products that are also animal and environmentally friendly. KVD Beauty Dazzle Vegan Long Wear Eyeshadow Stick in Electro Bolt is a great addition to my makeup collection. It is easy to use, gives great results and stays beautiful all day long. I highly recommend it to those looking for a high quality, long lasting eyeshadow with a hint of sparkle.

reviews.review_text: I received this product from influenster in exchange for my honest review and all of my opinions are my own. Now that that's out of the way, this eyeshadow stick is gorgeous! It lasts all day no smearing or smudging or creasing, and I have hooded eyes so the no creasing is a big deal for me. It's very pigmented and smooth. It feels cold on the skin almost wet when applying but it's more of a soft cream formula. It's an interesting texture. After applying you need to blend fast because it drys down fast. I'd recommend doing one eye at a time, but it does blend nicely as long as you do it quickly. After it sets, that's it. It's not coming off until you wash it off. Even the glitter stays in place with the exception of one or two strays from blending. It really is beautiful I got the shade flash storm 30, it's a medium/light neutral brown filled with green, blue, copper, and silver shifting sparkles. I'm very interested to see what other shades they have and I plan on buying a couple of I see some colors I like. I would highly recommend this eyeshadow stick it's fantastic!

It feels cold going on and like it‚Äôs going to be tacky, but after it dries down it‚Äôs not that tacky to where you would notice it, only if you touch it. 10/10 would recommend, I know I‚Äôm going to be buying more colors!!

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the KVD Beauty Dazzle Long Wear Eyeshadow Stick, and it has quickly become a go-to product in my makeup collection. As someone who loves vibrant, long-lasting eye makeup, this eyeshadow stick truly impresses with its performance and ease of use. One of the standout features of this eyeshadow stick is its intense pigmentation. The color payoff is exceptional, delivering rich, vibrant hues with just one swipe. The shade range is stunning, with a variety of colors that include both bold and neutral options, making it easy to find the perfect shade for any look. The Dazzle Long Wear Eyeshadow Stick is incredibly easy to apply. The creamy formula glides effortlessly across the eyelids, allowing for smooth and even application. Whether I'm creating a quick, everyday look or a more dramatic, smoky eye, this eyeshadow stick makes the process quick and hassle-free. Another fantastic aspect is its long-lasting wear. Once applied, the eyeshadow stays put throughout the day without creasing, smudging, or fading. This is particularly impressive given its creamy texture, as many similar products tend to crease over time. With this eyeshadow stick, I can confidently wear it from morning to night without needing touch-ups. The built-in sharpener is a thoughtful addition, ensuring that the stick maintains a precise tip for detailed application. This is especially useful for creating defined lines or more intricate eye makeup looks.

reviews.review_title: This gives a shimmer like no other !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: üíúHey gorgeous souls! üåü Today, I am absolutely thrilled to talk about a gem that has truly dazzled its way into my heart ‚Äì the KVD Dazzle Stick in the shade Flash Storm 30. If you‚Äôre a fan of eye-catching, prismatic eyeshadow looks, then keep reading!  üíúLet‚Äôs dive right into the color ‚Äì Flash Storm 30 is an absolute stunner. It‚Äôs this mesmerizing blend of multidimensional pearls that creates a shimmer so captivating, pictures just don‚Äôt do it justice. You really have to see it in real life to appreciate its full glory. The way it catches the light and adds that extra sparkle to your eyes is simply magical. I‚Äôm in love!  üíúWhat makes the KVD Dazzle Stick a cult favorite is its incredible long-wear formula. It glides on effortlessly and locks into place, ensuring your eyeshadow looks fresh and vibrant all day long. Whether you‚Äôre heading to a day at the office or a night out, this stick has got you covered.  üíúOne of the most unique aspects of the Dazzle Stick is its refreshing water base. With 36% water content, it feels incredibly cool and soothing on the lids when you apply it. It dries down to a smooth, sparkling finish that doesn‚Äôt budge. And don‚Äôt let the water base fool you ‚Äì this product is packed with pigment. A single swipe delivers opaque color and next-level shimmer that can transform any look from simple to spectacular.  üíúUsing the Dazzle Stick couldn‚Äôt be easier. You can swipe it directly onto your lids and blend it out, or use your finger to tap the pigment on for a more controlled application. For even more precision, a flat brush works wonders to pack the color onto your lids. And the best part? No primer needed. This stick does all the heavy lifting on its own. I also love getting creative by combining different shades together for a custom, multi-dimensional look.  üíúAnd of course, KVD Beauty has maintained its commitment to being 100% vegan and cruelty-free, which makes loving this product even easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received the KVD Beauty Dazzle Long-Wear Eyeshadow Stick in Flash Storm complimentary through Influenster for my honest review, and it has truly impressed me with its performance and convenience.  First and foremost, the application is a dream. The stick glides smoothly over the eyelids, delivering a stunning, highly pigmented color with ease. The compact design makes it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, fitting effortlessly into even the smallest of makeup bags.  The longevity of this eyeshadow stick is remarkable. It lasts all day without fading or creasing, maintaining its dazzling brilliance from morning until night. Additionally, its smudge-proof formula ensures that your eye makeup stays flawless, even through long hours and humid conditions.  The color Flash Storm is absolutely beautiful, adding a touch of glamour to any look. It's versatile enough for both daytime elegance and nighttime drama, making it a great addition to any makeup collection.  However, I must mention that the safety rating for this product is 49/100. This is due to some low-risk ingredients and the presence of Phenoxyethanol, a moderate-risk ingredient that can be an endocrine disruptor and may cause allergic reactions. While this didn't personally affect me, it's important for potential users to be aware of these factors, especially if they have sensitive skin or specific ingredient concerns.  Overall, despite the safety rating, I am very pleased with the KVD Beauty Dazzle Long-Wear Eyeshadow Stick. Its long-lasting wear, ease of application, and stunning color make it a standout product in my makeup routine. If you're looking for an eyeshadow that delivers on performance and beauty, this is definitely worth considering.

reviews.review_text: As a beauty influencer, I'm always searching for products that effortlessly elevate my makeup looks, and the KVD Dazzle Longwear Eyeshadow Stick definitely caught my attention. Here's why:  First off, let's talk about convenience. This eyeshadow stick is the ultimate on-the-go essential. Its sleek and portable design makes it perfect for tossing in your purse or travel bag, ensuring you can add a touch of sparkle wherever you go.  But what truly sets this eyeshadow stick apart is its formula. The creamy texture glides effortlessly onto the lids, delivering a smooth and even application every time. Whether you're a makeup pro or a beginner, you'll appreciate how easy it is to achieve a flawless finish with this product.  And let's not forget about the shimmer factor. The KVD Dazzle Longwear Eyeshadow Stick is packed with ultra-fine glitter that catches the light in all the right ways. Whether you're going for a subtle shimmer or a full-on glittery glam, this eyeshadow stick delivers.  But the best part? Its longwear formula. Once applied, this eyeshadow stick stays put all day (or night) long, without creasing or fading. Say goodbye to constant touch-ups and hello to effortless, long-lasting sparkle.  Plus, it's vegan and cruelty-free, so you can feel good about adding it to your makeup routine.  If you're looking to add some sparkle and shine to your makeup looks, the KVD Dazzle Longwear Eyeshadow Stick is a must-have. With its creamy formula, intense glitter payoff, and long-lasting wear, it's sure to become a staple in your collection.

reviews.review_text: I bought both Electro Bolt and Lightning Strike. These take a little getting used to but they‚Äôre so gorgeous it‚Äôs worth it. You have to have the lightest hand because they‚Äôre so soft they‚Äôll smush if you press too hard. If you apply too much it will get a bit clumpy and patchy. I swatched on the back of my hand a few times to figure out the right pressure and amount to apply. For me they wore well and the shimmer is super intense which is what I was looking for. Electro Bolt is a copper shade with light green shimmer, which sounds weird but is surprisingly pretty and the contrast makes the shimmer stand out and look beaming. Lightning Strike is a bronze with gold shimmer and is beautifulllllllll on deep skin.

reviews.review_title: Not what I was looking for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm currently searching for a coppery eyeshadow stick that I could just put on my eyes and throw it into my bag while I'm on the go. I was going to buy the Laura Mercier Caviar Stick, but I discovered the KVD Dazzle Stick and decided to try that instead. Here's the rundown:  Pros: - a lot of product in the little tube - the colour is beautiful - the teensiest bit of product is enough to cover an entire eyelid - easiy to blend  Cons: - the color is VERY bright and vivid (ie. not for everyday wear) - the product is super soft, the slightest bit of pressure will cause the shadow to mush down or break off - the glitter gets everywhere and won't come off unless you scrub your entire face - the copper shade leans more gold than copper  I really want to love this, and if I had parties or events to go to, I would definitely get some use out of it. But since my life only consists of zoom calls and going to work, I need something a lot more toned down.

reviews.review_title: Flash storm not Dreamy Silver but Taupe

reviews.review_text: Flash storm is not a Dreamy Stirling as indicated.  It is a taupe base with greenish blue sparkles. Goes on smoothly, dries down. No  sparkle drop under eye. Beautiful color but not as pictured on the swatch and the true color of sparkles are not showing on the pictures and uploads. Not considered a cool tone on fair skin since base is way too much taupe warm tone.

reviews.review_text: These are beautiful!  I haven't purchased anything from the brand in the last couple of years due to all of the chaos and drama that it has gone through and quite honestly, nothing has really appealed to me. when I saw some swatches of these shadow sticks, though, I was curious so I splurged and purchased just one. It's gorgeous. It can be applied straight from the stick onto the eyelid but I find that it's easier to get a more precise application if I apply the product onto my finger and then onto my lid. The result is fabulous. It's very opaque  without having to build it up, I don't get any creasing throughout the day, no fallout whatsoever, and it still looks really good up until I'm ready to remove it before I go to bed. I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 simply because it is expensive for a single eyeshadow but that being said, it's very lovely and I wouldn't mind picking up another shade.

reviews.review_text: if you're an eyeshadow junkie like me I really don't think these are going to have a huge place in your collection they were pretty patchy they're a very jelly texture and when trying to build to full opacity usually ends up in a Creasy mess I can definitely get more impact from a powder eyeshadow and a little setting spray I'm sorry I bought two wanted to love them but they're just meh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this up on a whim and am so glad I did! I used it this morning to get ready in a pinch. I didn't use anything as a base and I wore it for 12 hours before removing my make up. It didn't crease at all!! I've used Mally sticks, which are nice but always crease. I've not tried the caviar sticks because that brand is not cruelty free. Another reviewer compared this to the Hourglass scattered light, which I also love, but this stick is bolder color than Hourglass's. I'm going to pick up another color!

reviews.review_text: I LOVEEE these! First of all, they‚Äôre very creamy and pigmented, so for someone like me who isn‚Äôt the greatest at doing make-up, it was super easy. You can use just the stick or what I did was put some on my lid then used my finger (again- I‚Äôm not a professional lol).  I didn‚Äôt find there to be any fall out. As long as you‚Äôre not putting a huge chunk on your lid, which you won‚Äôt need since these are so pigmented, you should be fine in regards to it not getting all over your face.  It lasted all night! I also find the packaging to be convenient for traveling as well as just overall good.  I have four shades and honestly will probably end up getting the rest. Perfect for fall/winter!
